Factual background
The Petitioner asserts that his family hails from Ratnapura. The 5th, 7th, and
14th Respondents are siblings of the Petitioner. According to the Petitioner, in
the  early  1970s,  the  entire  family  relocated  to  Vavuniya  due  to  escalating

communal 
tensions 
in  Ratnapura.  However, 
the  5th
Respondents dispute this claim, asserting that the Petitioner never resided in
Ratnapura and instead departed for Iran around 1977.
The  Petitioner's  family  sought  refuge  on  State  land  in  Vavuniya.  Joseph
